snippet: The St. Louis County prosecutor asked a federal judge on Monday to dismiss a lawsuit from a grand juror who wants to speak publicly about the case of Darren Wilson, the Ferguson police officer who fatally shot Michael Brown.
abstract: St Louis County prosecutor Robert P McCulloch requests dismissal of lawsuit from grand juror seeking to publicly discuss case of Darren Wilson, police officer who fatally shot Michael Brown in Ferguson, Mo; state law bars grand jurors from discussing their cases.
lead_paragraph: The St. Louis County prosecutor asked a federal judge on Monday to dismiss a lawsuit from a grand juror who wants to speak publicly about the case of Darren Wilson, the Ferguson police officer who fatally shot Michael Brown.

headline.main: Missouri: Prosecutor Seeks Dismissal of Grand Juror’s Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Prosecutor Seeks Dismissal of Grand Juror’s Lawsuit
